Column Comment.0: LAND RIGHT SUBTYPE: column indicating the type of land right. Must be one of thevalid subtypes: LAND TITLE, LAND LEASE, LAND GRANTED RIGHT, LAND UNIT,LAND UNIT TRACT, LAND AGREEMENT, LAND AGREE PART.
Column Comment.1: LAND RIGHT ID: Unique Identifier for the land right. A land right is the rights youhave to land, regardless of how obtained. It may be owned outright, rented, aquiredby agreement or contract.
Column Comment.2: REMARK ID: unique identifier for the remark.
Column Comment.3: REMARK SEQ NO: Unique identifer added to allow sequencing of very long remarks,which may require multiple entries.
Column Comment.4: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.7: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.8: RECOMMEND IMPL IND: Indicates whether recommendation was implementedwhen the remark is a recommendation.
Column Comment.9: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.10: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as aperson, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
Column Comment.11: REMARK DATE: Date recommendation was made
Column Comment.12: REMARK TYPE: Entries in this column describe the general topic of the remark, sothat remarks can be grouped by subject area. Topics might include royaltycomments, well comments, deficiencies, rental billing comments, etc.
Column Comment.13: REMARK USER: Name of the person who made the recommendation
Column Comment.14: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.15: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.16: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.17: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.18: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.19: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.20: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.21: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
